GSD.description:
iommu: Fix potential use-after-free during probe

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.15.24 by commit 65ab30f6a6952fa9ee13009862736cf8d110e6e5. For more details please see the references link.
